Headline: No trains between Forest Park and UIC
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Forest Park and UIC/Halsted due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Forest Park and UIC/Halsted due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Rosemont and UIC/Halsted at this time.

 Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

 At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
